name: Roy Tang
text:
One
 would think that given the daily absurdities happening in local 
politics there would be a lot of source material, but actually many of 
the problems are difficult to compress into a few panels with little 
space for text. Outside of that, we are left with the low-hanging fruit 
of pointing out simple hypocrysies, but even then the stories are 
largely all the same (mostly "You say X but you do Y") with only slight 
variations in the language and the actors and the circumstances, so I'm 
not sure I would be able to keep up such a thing on a regular basis
